title: Keine Bewegungen, Keine Spells, Lags, Disc.   GG RIOT!!!!
body:
are u fucking kidding me riot?
ive played one game, now second.
in both games i cant move or use spells. I see everyone else moving but i cant move or use spells?
ping is high as a motherfucking bastard and it tries to reconnect EVEN THOUGH im fucking online of course??

I got demoted and now i lost the second game?? Are you motherfucking kidding me riot? are you??
cus its not fucking funny anymore!

I see all the other threads having the same issue and apparently you are so fucking ashamed u dont even bother
to answer.

sure as shit i wouldnt either if i knew that my EUWEST servers are shit as hell.

Not even a motherfucking loss forgiven from you??
you wont me seeing buy rp again

AND NOW YOU ASKED ME INGAME TO AGREE TO NOT GO AFK AGAIN????? ARE U FUCKING KIDDING ME RIOT??
I CANT FUCKING MOVE CUS OF YOUR TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES AND U TELL ME TO AGREE TO NOT GO AFK AGAIN???
FIX YOUR SHIT AND FUCKING APOLOGIZE TO ME PERSONALLY YOU CHEEKY LIARS!

HF!
